baseline_texts: The image shows a piece of green cloth placed on a wooden table. In the background, there is a ceramic cup with a white floral pattern. Additionally, there is a pen and a piece of white paper with some writing on them on the right side of the table. The edge of a person's arm resting on the table is also partially visible on the left.

This frame shows a close-up of a hand adjusting or placing a green cloth on a wooden surface, such as a table or desk. On the table, there is also a patterned mug, a magazine or book with a colorful cover, and some white papers or documents with writing and a pen on top. The overall setting appears indoors and seems to be a casual or work-related environment.

The frame shows a close-up of a person's left hand resting on a green cloth placed on a wooden surface. In the background, there is a green cup with a white pattern, some scattered papers, and a yellow pencil. Part of the person's wrist and forearm is also visible, and they are wearing a dark wristwatch on their left wrist. The setting appears to be a desk or table, possibly in a casual or study environment.

The image shows a hand reaching toward or placing something on a green square cloth on a wooden surface, likely a table or desk. On the left side of the image, a part of an arm wearing a black wristwatch is visible. In the background, there is a green patterned cup and some papers with handwritten notes on the right side. The overall setting appears to be indoors, possibly at a workspace or study area.

The image shows a close-up of a hand holding two pieces of green fabric, placed on a light wooden surface, possibly a table or desk. The thumb and fingers are pinching the fabric, suggesting some sort of sewing or fabric manipulation activity. In the background, part of a green patterned container and some papers or a notebook and a pen can be seen. The setting appears to be a workspace or crafting area.

The image shows a close-up of a person's left hand holding a piece of green fabric or cloth. The cloth is partially covering a black lighter with a visible red button, which is lying on a wooden surface, possibly a desk or table. There are some papers and a small part of another object visible in the top right corner of the image. The focus appears to be on the hand and cloth in the foreground.

The frame shows a wooden surface on which a black lighter with a red top is placed. Part of a green object or cloth is visible in the foreground, slightly obscuring the view. Also, there is a cup with a floral pattern and part of a pen and a piece of paper with some writing on it in the background. Additionally, a small portion of a hand and a darker item is visible on the left side.

The frame shows a close-up of a light-colored wooden table. On the table, there is a black lighter with a red ignition button placed near the center. To the upper right of the lighter, there is a partly visible object that appears to be a cup or a mug with a floral pattern. In the top right corner, there are some papers and what looks like a yellow pen or pencil partially visible. The background includes some dark fabric or clothing on the left side.
diff_texts: Initial frame. No previous frame to compare.

In the current frame, a hand has appeared in the lower-left area of the cloth, moving toward or interacting with the green cloth on the table. The cloth has slightly shifted or wrinkled where the hand approaches.
The hand has moved closer to the green cloth, with fingers slightly more spread and positioned above the cloth in the current frame compared to the previous one.
The hand moved slightly to the right and forward, with the fingers spreading out more over the green cloth.
The hand has moved to pinch and lift a corner of the green cloth, causing the cloth to fold and rise off the surface.
The hand lifted the green cloth from the table and is now holding it up in the current frame.
The green cloth that was being held above the lighter in the previous frame is now moved away, uncovering the lighter which is fully visible on the surface.
The green object that was partially covering the lighter in the previous frame is no longer present, revealing the lighter fully on the table.
